sections.title: Entrance Antiphon 184 - Cf. Psalm 17:6, 8
sections.author: Let Us All Rejoice
sections.snippet: To you I call, for you will surely heed me, O God; turn your ear to me; hear my words. Guard me as the apple of your eye; in the shadow of your wings protect me.

sections.title: Psalm 98:1, 2-3, 3-4
sections.author: Francesca LaRosa
sections.snippet: The Lord has revealed to the nations his saving power.

sections.author: Hebrews 4:12
sections.snippet: The word of God is living and effective, discerning reflections and thoughts of the heart.
sections.title: Alleluia
In Every Age
sections.author: Jan√®t Sullivan Whitaker
sections.snippet: Long before the mountains came to be and the land and sea and stars of the night; through the endless seasons of all time, you have always been, you will always be.

sections.author: John W. Thompson, Randy Scruggs
sections.snippet: Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary; pure and holy; tried and true. With thanksgiving; I'll be a living Sanctuary for You.
sections.title: Sanctuary
Shelter Me, O God
sections.author: Bob Hurd
sections.snippet: Shelter me, O God, hide me in the shadow of your wings. You alone are my hope.

sections.title: Christ in Me Arise
sections.author: Trevor Thomson
sections.snippet: Christ in me arise and dispel all the darkness. Christ in me arise with your power and your strength. Christ in me pour out your blessing and healing. Christ in me arise and I shall rise with you.

sections.title: Forever
sections.author: Chris Tomlin
sections.snippet: Give thanks to the Lord, our God and King; his love endures forever. For he is good, he is above all things; his love endures forever; Sing praise, sing praise!

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lord have mercy! Christ have mercy! Lord have mercy!

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: When we eat this breadand drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
